trans-unit.source: Represents a container for bitmap frames.
trans-unit.target: Representa um contentor para molduras de mapa de bits.

trans-unit.source: Each bitmap frame is a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Cada frame de mapa de bits é um <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This abstract class provides a base set of functionality for all derived decoder objects.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe abstrata fornece um conjunto de base de funcionalidades para todos os objetos de descodificador derivada.

trans-unit.source: BitmapDecoder is not a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame> itself; rather, it is a container for <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame> objects.
trans-unit.target: BitmapDecoder não é um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame>próprio; em vez disso, é um contentor para <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame>objetos.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame>

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame> in the container can potentially have different attributes, including different sizes, resolutions, or palettes.
trans-unit.target: Cada <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame>no contentor, potencialmente, podem ter atributos diferentes, incluindo tamanhos diferentes, as resoluções ou palettes.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame>

trans-unit.source: Unless a specific codec is selected, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] uses automatic run-time discovery to identify the format of an image and match it with the appropriate codec.
trans-unit.target: A menos que um codec específico estiver selecionada, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] utiliza a deteção automática do tempo de execução para identificar o formato de uma imagem e a correspondência com o codec adequado.

trans-unit.source: This discovery process allows a codec developed by an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_isv](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-isv-md.md)] to be automatically discoverable by the system.
trans-unit.target: Este processo de deteção permite um codec desenvolvido por um [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_isv](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-isv-md.md)] ser automaticamente Detetáveis pelo sistema.

trans-unit.source: To select a specific codec, the derived BitmapDecoder or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapEncoder>, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TiffBitmapDecoder> class, should be used.
trans-unit.target: Para selecionar um codec específico, o BitmapDecoder derivada ou <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapEncoder>, tais como o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TiffBitmapDecoder>classe, deve ser utilizado.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TiffBitmapDecoder> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapEncoder>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gif](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-gif-md.md)] are the only implemented image formats that support multiple frames.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)]e [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gif](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-gif-md.md)] são os únicos implementado formatos de imagem que suportam várias fotogramas.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapDecoder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapDecoder"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets information that describes this codec.
trans-unit.target: Obtém as informações que descrevem este codec.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCodecInfo> implementation is required for every codec.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCodecInfo>implementação é necessária para cada codec.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCodecInfo>

trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCodecInfo"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância de <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCodecInfo"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade não tem nenhum valor predefinido.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that represents the color profile associated with a bitmap, if one is defined.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que representa o perfil de cor associado um mapa de bits, se não for definido um.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"></xref> that represents the embedded color profile of the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância de <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"> </xref> que representa o perfil de cor incorporados o mapa de bits.

trans-unit.source: If no color profile has been defined, this property returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Não se foi definido nenhum perfil de cor, esta propriedade devolve <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade não tem nenhum valor predefinido.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapDecoder"></xref> from a <xref:System.IO.Stream> by using the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Cria um <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapDecoder"> </xref> de um <xref:System.IO.Stream>utilizando especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions"> </xref> e <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption"> </xref>.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption> cache option if you wish to close the `bitmapStream` after the decoder is created.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption>cache opção se pretender fechar os `bitmapStream` após o descodificador é criado.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption>

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption> cache option retains access to the stream until the bitmap is needed, and cleanup is handled by the garbage collector.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption>opção cache mantém o acesso no fluxo até que o mapa de bits não é necessário e limpeza é processada pelo garbage collector.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption>

trans-unit.source: The file stream that identifies the bitmap to decode.
trans-unit.target: O fluxo do ficheiro que identifica o mapa de bits ao descodificar.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions"></xref> for this decoder.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions"> </xref> para este descodificador.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption"></xref> for this decoder.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption"> </xref> para este descodificador.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapDecoder"></xref> from a <xref:System.IO.Stream> by using the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapDecoder"> </xref> de um <xref:System.IO.Stream>utilizando especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions"> </xref> e <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption"> </xref>.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapDecoder"></xref> from a <xref:System.Uri> by using the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Cria um <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapDecoder"> </xref> de um <xref:System.Uri>utilizando especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions"> </xref> e <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption"> </xref>.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Uri> of the bitmap to decode.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Uri>de mapa de bits ao descodificar.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions"></xref> for this decoder.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions"> </xref> para este descodificador.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption"></xref> for this decoder.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption"> </xref> para este descodificador.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapDecoder"></xref> from a <xref:System.Uri> by using the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapDecoder"> </xref> de um <xref:System.Uri>utilizando especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions"> </xref> e <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption"> </xref>.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: The bitmapUri is .
trans-unit.target: The bitmapUri is .

trans-unit.source: The bitmapUri specifies a class ID of an unsupported format type.
trans-unit.target: O bitmapUri Especifica um ID de classe de um tipo de formato não suportado.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapDecoder"></xref> from a <xref:System.Uri> by using the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption"></xref> and <xref href="System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Creates a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapDecoder"></xref> from a <xref:System.Uri> by using the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption"></xref> and <xref href="System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy"></xref>.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: Create is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: Criar é apresentado no .NET Framework versão 3.5.

trans-unit.source: The location of the bitmap from which the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapDecoder"></xref> is created.
trans-unit.target: A localização do mapa de bits a partir do qual o <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapDecoder"> </xref> é criado.

trans-unit.source: The options that are used to create this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapDecoder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: As opções que são utilizadas para criar esta <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapDecoder"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The cache option that is used to create this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapDecoder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A opção de cache que é utilizada para criar esta <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapDecoder"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The caching requirements for this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapDecoder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Os requisitos de colocação em cache para este <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapDecoder"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapDecoder"></xref> from a <xref:System.Uri> by using the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption"></xref> and <xref href="System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapDecoder"></xref> from a <xref:System.Uri> by using the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption"></xref> and <xref href="System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy"></xref>.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.InPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter"></xref>, which can be used to update the metadata of a bitmap.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.InPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter"> </xref>, que podem ser utilizadas para atualizar os metadados de um mapa de bits.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.InPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância de <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.InPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The file original image stream is read only.
trans-unit.target: O fluxo de imagem original do ficheiro é só de leitura.

trans-unit.source: The decoder is not a built in decoder.
trans-unit.target: O descodificador não é um descodificador incorporado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapDecoder"></xref> has finished downloading bitmap content.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapDecoder"> </xref> terminou de transferir conteúdo do mapa de bits.

trans-unit.source: This event may not be raised for all types of bitmap content.
trans-unit.target: Este evento não pode ser gerado para todos os tipos de conteúdo do mapa de bits.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when bitmap content failed to download.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando não foi possível transferir o conteúdo do mapa de bits.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapDecoder"></xref> has made progress downloading bitmap content.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapDecoder"> </xref> efetuou progresso transferir conteúdo do mapa de bits.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Frees resources and performs other cleanup operations before the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapDecoder"></xref> is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: Liberta recursos e efetuar outras operações de limpeza antes do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapDecoder"> </xref> é reclamada a recolha de lixo.

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Este método substitui <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Application code should not call this method; an object's `Finalize` method is automatically invoked during garbage collection, unless finalization by the garbage collector has been disabled by a call to the <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Código da aplicação não deve chamar este método; um objeto `Finalize` método é invocado automaticamente durante a recolha de lixo, a menos que Finalização pelo garbage collector foi desativada por uma chamada para o <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A>método.</xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Finalize Methods and Destructors](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [finalizar métodos e os processos de destruição](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [recursos não geridos limpeza](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), e [a substituir o método Finalize](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

trans-unit.source: Gets the content of an individual frame within a bitmap.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o conteúdo de um frame individuais dentro de um mapa de bits.

trans-unit.source: Only [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gif](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-gif-md.md)] images support more than one frame.
trans-unit.target: Apenas [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)] e [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gif](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-gif-md.md)] imagens suportam mais do que uma moldura.

trans-unit.source: Any <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame> objects returned by this property are frozen.
trans-unit.target: Qualquer <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame>objetos devolvidos por esta propriedade são interrompidos.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame>

trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância de <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade não tem nenhum valor predefinido.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates if the decoder is currently downloading content.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o descodificador está a transferir conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the decoder is downloading content; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o descodificador está a transferir conteúdo; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata"></xref> that represents the global metadata associated with this bitmap, if metadata is defined.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma instância de <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata"> </xref> que representa os metadados global associado este mapa de bits, se não for definido metadados.

trans-unit.source: None of the built-in derived <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapDecoder> classes support global metadata.
trans-unit.target: Nenhuma das incorporada derivada <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapDecoder>classes suportam metadados globais.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapDecoder>

trans-unit.source: Metadata should be added to the individual frames of an image.
trans-unit.target: Metadados devem ser adicionado para os frames individuais de uma imagem.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata"></xref> that represents global metadata associated with a bitmap.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância de <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata"> </xref> que representa global metadados associados um mapa de bits.

trans-unit.source: If no metadata is defined, this property returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Se não existem metadados estiver definido, esta propriedade devolve <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapPalette"></xref> associated with this decoder.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapPalette"> </xref> associados a este descodificador.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapPalette"></xref> associated with this decoder.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapPalette"> </xref> associados a este descodificador.

trans-unit.source: If the bitmap has no palette, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se o mapa de bits não tem nenhum paleta <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> é devolvido.

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade não tem nenhum valor predefinido.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"></xref> that represents the global preview of this bitmap, if one is defined.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"> </xref> que representa a pré-visualização global deste mapa de bits, se não for definido um.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource> returned by this property is frozen.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource>devolvido por esta propriedade está fixa.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"></xref> that represents the global preview of the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"> </xref> que representa a pré-visualização global do mapa de bits.

trans-unit.source: If no preview is defined, this property returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Se nenhum pré-visualização estiver definida, esta propriedade devolve <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade não tem nenhum valor predefinido.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"></xref> that represents the thumbnail of the bitmap, if one is defined.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"> </xref> que representa o thumbnail do mapa de bits, se não for definido um.

trans-unit.source: None of the native formats support global thumbnails.
trans-unit.target: Dos formatos nativos suporta miniaturas globais.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpegorg](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-jpegorg-md.md)], [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)], and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wdp](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wdp-md.md)] support frame-level thumbnails that can be accessed using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.Thumbnail%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpegorg](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-jpegorg-md.md)], [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)], e [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wdp](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wdp-md.md)] suporta miniaturas de nível de moldura que podem ser acedidas utilizando o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.Thumbnail%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.Thumbnail%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource> returned by this property is frozen.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource>devolvido por esta propriedade está fixa.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"></xref> that represents a thumbnail of the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"> </xref> que representa uma miniatura do mapa de bits.

trans-unit.source: If no thumbnail is defined, this property returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Se nenhuma miniatura estiver definida, esta propriedade devolve <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade não tem nenhum valor predefinido.

trans-unit.source: Converts the current value of a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapDecoder"></xref> to a <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: Converte o valor atual de um <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapDecoder"> </xref> para <xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: A string representation of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapDecoder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma representação de cadeia do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapDecoder"> </xref>.
